title: ðŸš¨Pat Shurmur fired, Dave Gettleman retained by Giants - Emergency Podcast (Football 12/30)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by Ryan Wilson to react to the Giants decision to fire Pat Shurmur after 2 seasons in New York. The guys discuss how much blame should be placed on Shurmur, how Dave Gettleman's presence could impact the coaching search and the most likely candidates to be hired.
